hypothesis_content.title: Crypto Momentum Reversal After 3-Day News Sentiment Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: When crypto momentum stocks experience 3 consecutive days of negative news sentiment (headlines containing 'wanes', 'avoid', 'capitulation') while BTC price remains within ±5% of its 20-day moving average, a short-term momentum reversal occurs within the next 2 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent headlines suggest momentum narratives are shifting while price action remains stable, creating potential for overreaction. Miner capitulation news historically precedes short-term bounces when not accompanied by price breakdowns.
entry_conditions: 3 consecutive days with ≥2 negative momentum headlines in major financial news
BTC price between 95% and 105% of its 20-day SMA
Crypto sector ETF (ARKW/BITO) shows ≥2% decline over the 3-day period

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain on crypto sector ETF position
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss or BTC breaks below 20-day SMA by >2%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: No statistically significant reversal (p<0.05) in crypto sector ETFs within 5 days following the 3-day negative news pattern during neutral/bull regimes.
